violations: Workers appear to be in close proximity to operating machinery without visible barriers.
Potential blocked pathway due to stacked items near machinery.
locations: Near the large machinery on the left and right sides of the image.
Central area where several workers are crouched around equipment.
Front center near stacked items beside the machine on the right.
recommendations: Ensure all workers are equipped with hard hats.
Provide and require high-visibility safety vests.
Establish and enforce safe distance protocols around operating machinery.
Clear pathways to ensure easy and safe worker movement.

One worker standing in front of the machinery on the right.
One worker near a control panel on the far right.
One worker sitting on the floor near the central area.
